00013 #ifndef _XVBLOBFEATURE_H_
00014 #define _XVBLOBFEATURE_H_

00016 #define DEFAULT_SAMPLING 1
00017 #define MAX_SAMPLING     10
00018 #define DEFAULT_PADSIZE  10
00019 
00020 #include <XVFeature.h>
00021 #include <XVSegmentation.h>
00022 #include <XVBlobs.h>
00023 
00024 typedef XVStatePair<XVRectangleBlob, double> XVBlobState;
00025 
00026 template <class IMTYPEIN, class IMTYPEOUT>
00027 class XVBlobFeature : public XVFeature<IMTYPEIN, IMTYPEIN, XVBlobState > {
00028 
00029   typedef XVSegmentation<typename IMTYPEIN::PIXELTYPE, 
00030                          typename IMTYPEOUT::PIXELTYPE> SEGTYPE;
00031  protected:
00032   using XVFeature<IMTYPEIN, IMTYPEIN, XVBlobState>::prevState ;
00033   using XVFeature<IMTYPEIN, IMTYPEIN, XVBlobState>::currentState ;
00034   using XVFeature<IMTYPEIN, IMTYPEIN, XVBlobState>::warped ;
00035   using XVFeature<IMTYPEIN, IMTYPEIN, XVBlobState>::warpUpdated ;
00036 
00037  protected:
00038 
00039   SEGTYPE * segmenter;
00040   bool withResampling;
00041   XVSize imSize;
00042 
00043   virtual XVRectangleBlob pad(int padding = DEFAULT_PADSIZE);
00044   
00045   virtual void resample(const IMTYPEIN &, IMTYPEIN &);
00046 
00047  public:
00048 
00049   typedef typename XVFeature<IMTYPEIN, IMTYPEIN, XVBlobState>::STATE STATE;
00050 
00051   XVBlobFeature() : XVFeature<IMTYPEIN,IMTYPEIN,XVBlobState>(),withResampling(false), segmenter(NULL) {}
00052 
00053   XVBlobFeature(SEGTYPE & seg, 
00054           bool res = false) : XVFeature<IMTYPEIN,IMTYPEIN,XVBlobState>(),segmenter(&seg), withResampling(res) {}
00055 
00056   XVBlobFeature(SEGTYPE & seg, 
00057           STATE init, bool res = false) : XVFeature<IMTYPEIN, IMTYPEIN, XVBlobState>(init), segmenter(&seg), withResampling(res) {}
00058 
00059   virtual IMTYPEIN warp(const IMTYPEIN &);
00060   virtual const XVBlobState & step(const IMTYPEIN &);
00061 
00062   virtual const XVBlobState & interactiveInit(XVInteractive &, const IMTYPEIN &);
00063   virtual void show(XVDrawable &,float scale=1.0);
00064 };
